Name: Paracetamol
Description: Used to relieve pain and reduce fever

Name: Amoxicillin
Description: Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections

Name: Ibuprofen
Description: Anti-inflammatory drug used for pain relief

Name: Cough Syrup
Description: Used to relieve cough and throat irritation

Name: Vitamin C
Description: Boosts immune system and helps tissue repair

Name: Metformin
Description: Used to control high blood sugar in type 2 diabetes

Name: Aspirin
Description: Used for pain relief and heart disease prevention

Name: Lisinopril
Description: Used to treat high blood pressure

Name: Omeprazole
Description: Reduces stomach acid and treats ulcers

Name: Cetirizine
Description: Antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms
